name: Brownie Clicker
description:
Inspired by the popular Cookie Clicker game, Brownie Clicker is a  clicker game that revolves around brownies. Click to earn brownies and buy upgrades to earn even more!

NOTE:

  • The new game button does actually reset your entire progress.  Quit the game and then reopen application for it to take effect.

How to install the game:

Windows:

  1. Download .zip file
  2. Extract file and open the folder
  3. Open BrownieClicker.exe

Mac:

  1. Download .zip file
  2. Extract zip file either through the built-in Archive Utility on MAC or through another program such as The Unarchiver
  3. Open BrownieClicker.app

If, for whatever reasons the game refuses to open, try installing the game through the Itch app.
